column3: Kate is looking {{c1::for}} a job. I hope she finds one soon.
Who looked {{c1::after}} you when you were sick?
I'm looking {{c1::for}} Lisa. I need to ask her something. Have you seen her?
The car park was full, so we had to look {{c1::for}} somewhere else to park.
A child minder is somebody who looks {{c1::after}} other people's children.
Don't worry about me. I can look {{c1::after}} myself.
